name: MySQL_Burger_Maker
description: A restaurant app using MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM, that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.  Whenever a user submits a burger's name, the app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured.  Each burger in the waiting area also has a `Devour it!` button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page.  This app stores every burger in a database, whether devoured or not.
